law.history: Repealed 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 186, sec. 4, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 393, sec. 21, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 310, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1980. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 155, sec. 48, effective June 17, 1978.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Functions and duties of deputy secretary for the office for policy and management.
